channel.title: Whats Your Why on Learning Along The Way
channel.description: Recent content in Whats Your Why on Learning Along The Way

item.title: What Do You Do For A Job?
item.description: Why can this so hard to answer? The trick part of the question is the ‘what’, it may be better to focus on the why. Yes, I stumbled my way through a bad response to an apparently simple and totally expected question. “Umm… I still haven’t managed to be able explain it to my parents.” This is an example of a particularly bad response because the focus is on the what.
